person.persName: William Wadlington, Sr. (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Father of Thomas B. Wadlington, Pernicia U. Wadlington Miller, Charles W. Wadlington, William J. Wadlington, and Margaret Wadlington. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1820. Owned six enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1820. Resident of Caldwell County in 1830. Resident of Caldwell County in 1840. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1840. Owned six enslaved persons (Matison, Albert, Henry, Hampton, Dick, and Jim) in Caldwell County in 1847. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned thirty-eight enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
